name: Aliensurvival (itch)
description:
Downloadable for Windows, Mac and Linux.

Alien Survival is a survival game settled in a postapocalittic landscape, you have to defeat all the several enemys that will try to kill you.

Errata corrige

This is still a demo, there surely be some bugs: help me developing the game sending me a comment or joining my discord server(who will give me helpful advice will recive a mention inside the credits)

KeyCommnadWASDWalkWASD +shiftRunRight-clickenter/exit fpsLeft-click + fpsFireRReloadingEInteract with objects1,2,3,4Use abilityescPauseleft-altShow cursor More about the diveloper

I'm an italian student at the university of Brescia , I'm 19 y.o and this is my first "real" project. I have been working on this project for nearly 5 months,Hope you have fun with this game xo.
